it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget.base.social
Class SocialBox

java.lang.Object
  it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget.base.social.SocialBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget, ResourceAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommentBox, FeedBox, ReplyBox
public abstract class SocialBox
extends Object
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, ResourceAware

Base container for social elements

This class is used as base container for all the social widgets, and consists of an image, and a content container. These are the known extending classes:
  • CommentBox
  • CommentBoxList
  • FeedBox
  • ReplyBox

Author:
Alessandro Casolla
